name: Malta School of Flying
about: Malta School of Flying, established in 2004, is a premier flight training institution based at Malta International Airport. With over 19 years of experience and a 100% safety record, we offer a comprehensive range of aviation training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Multi-Engine Piston Rating, and Instrument Rating. Our team of highly qualified and experienced instructors, with over 50,000 hours of combined flying experience, ensures top-notch training. We boast the largest fleet of training aircraft in Malta, including Tecnam and Cessna models, and state-of-the-art facilities such as an Alsim ALX simulator. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our 100% first-time pass rate for advanced courses. We welcome students from around the world to train in our ideal Mediterranean location, providing a professional and supportive environment to become skilled and employable pilots.
services:
["Induction Courses
Private Pilot Licence (PPL)
Hour Building
Night Rating
Airline Transport Pilot Licence (ATPL) Theory Course
Multi Engine Piston (MEP) Rating
Basic Instrument Flight Module (BIFM)
Commercial pilot Licence (CPL)
Instrument Rating (IR) and Multi-Engine Instrument Rating (ME-IR)
Multi Crew Cooperation (MCC)
Jet Orientation Course (JOC)
Flight Instructor Course (FIC)
FAA/ICAO to EASA License Conversion
Radio Telephony & Aviation English Courses
Renewals & Revalidations"]
